channel.title: Help with what the bank says

item.title: Help with what the bank says
item.dc:creator: @mage_ur_as mage ur as
item.description:
@mage_ur_as wrote:

im wondering if theres something you put to make it say something like "the official bank of (personsnick)

i have this sendQuest("@red@The Official Bank Of +PlayerHandler.getPlayerName()", 5383);

but its not working, can some1 help me what i should put there in stead of +PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()

Read full topic
item.source: Help with what the bank says
